Galaxy Datacache

This server contains a copy of the reference data used on usegalaxy.org. In addition to HTTP, you can access it via multiple other methods:

  • rsync, via rsync://datacache.galaxyproject.org/
  • CernVM-FS (CVMFS), from the Stratum 1 servers available, listed on the Galaxy Hub
  • The rsync Data Manager.

Contents

  • /managed - Managed Galaxy Data (created with Galaxy Data Managers)
  • /indexes - Galaxy Genome Indexes (pre-Data Manager manually curated data)
